alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Jackson, Foard, northwestern Knox, western Wilbarger and Hardeman Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1144 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary ahead of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Quanah to 12 miles south of Goodlett to 3 miles south of Paducah. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Quanah, Crowell, Chillicothe, Thalia, Margaret, Goodlett, Lockett, Medicine Mound, Fargo, Odell, Truscott, Lazare, Rayland, and Copper Breaks State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: This wind shift will affect fire fighting efforts. Please advise fire crews in the field of the change in wind direction. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
